title: Photoshopped Pic Of A Muslim Woman With A Pro-Modi Placard Revived
subtitle: The original image has, “I’m a Muslim but I’m not Arab” written on it.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
A Muslim woman wearing a hijab and holding a placard that reads, "If Modi wanted to fill his own house, he could have done that just by being a CM. He loves the country, not the position."

The picture is part of a campaign against stereotypes on campus, that happened at the University of Mary Washington in Virginia. The original image has, “I’m a Muslim but I’m not Arab” written on it. The placard also has, “DON’T STEREOTYPE ME UMW INA CAMPAIGN” written in block letters. BOOM had debunked the same image in March 2019.
